maml:description.maml:para: Allows to replicate the image to target replica locations or allows to share/stop sharing the replicated images.
Specifies the name of the image in the user image library.
Specifies the locations that image will be replicated
Specifies the name of the image in the user image library.
Specifies the sharing permission of replicated image.
Specifies the name of the image in the user image library.
Specifies the locations that image will be replicated
Specifies the sharing permission of replicated image.

maml:alert.maml:para: Keywords: azure, azuresm, servicemanagement, management, service, image, vm, platform

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Set-AzurePlatformVMImage -ImageName Win7UserImage -ReplicaLocations @("West US", "East US")

command:commandLine.command:commandText: -----------Starts the replication of the "Win7UserImage" from the user image repository to "West US" and "East US" locations.
-----------Shares the replicas of Win7UserImage with Public if the replication is completed, otherwise the request is recorded and when the replication completes after then they are shared.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Set-AzurePlatformVMImage -ImageName Win7UserImage -Permission Private
Stops the sharing of the replicas of Win7UserImage with Public.

maml:alert.maml:para: Keywords: azure, azuresm, servicemanagement, management, service, image, vm, platform
